features: 24-fluid ounce bottle with pump of Lubriderm Daily Moisture Lotion + Pro Ceramide, contains shea butter and glycerin, moisturizes to help restore skin's moisture barrier for healthier-looking skin

The lightweight face, hand and body lotion is formulated with Pro-Ceramide and glycerin to penetrate within skin's surface hydrates to help restore skin's moisture barrier. The daily lotion delivers clinically proven 24-hour moisturization

Non-greasy moisturizing lotion with shea butter is non-comedogenic and won't clog pores, making it suitable for the face and body. The hydrating lotion can be used on all skin types, including sensitive skin
The fast-absorbing daily moisture lotion has been allergy- and dermatologist-tested and formulated free of parabens, phthalates, and dyes

From a brand developed by dermatologists, Lubriderm Daily Moisture Lotion + Pro-Ceramide hydrates to help restore skin's moisture barrier. To use, smooth onto face, hands and body daily or as directed by a physician
body.description: Ideal for all skin types, Lubriderm Daily Moisture Lotion + Pro-Ceramide is our solution to nourish and moisturize dry skin. From Lubriderm, a dermatologist developed brand, this daily hydrating lotion is clinically shown to help moisturize dry skin for 24 hours to help restore skin's natural moisture barrier for healthier-looking skin. Daily body lotion is formulated with Pro-Ceramides and glycerin that penetrate within skin's surface and shea butter to hydrate dry skin. Non-greasy lotion is non-comedogenic and won't clog pores, making it suitable for use on hands, body and face. The lightweight, fast absorbing lotion is suitable for sensitive skin, has been allergy- and dermatologist-tested and is formulated free of parabens, phthalates and dyes. To use, smooth on face, hands, and body daily or as directed by a physician.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compare Our Products Daily Moisture Lotion Daily Moisture FF Lotion Advanced Therapy Lotion Intense Skin Repair Advanced Therapy Wash Daily Moisture Wash Skin Type All Skin Types All Skin Types Itchy, Extra-Dry Skin Rough, Dry Skin Itchy, Dry Skin All Skin Types Key Ingredients Shea Butter and Glycerin Shea Butter and Glycerin Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 Vitamin E and Minerals Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 Shea Butter Clinically Proven Hydration 24 Hours 24 Hours 48 Hours 48 Hours When Paired with Lotion When Paired with Lotion Pro-Ceramide Technology ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Suitable for Body + Face ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✘ ✔ Suitable for Sensitive Skin ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Hypoallergenic ✘ ✘ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Allergy Tested ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Fragrance-Free ✘ ✔ ✘ ✔ ✔ ✘ Parabens, Phthalates and Dyes ✘ ✘ ✘ ✘ ✘ ✘

My bottle looks different, did Lubriderm change their packaging? Yes, you may have noticed that we have updated our packaging to showcase our new & improved formula with Pro-Ceramide. This exciting change reflects our commitment to delivering high-quality products. You may receive either design for a short time. Did Lubriderm change their formulas? Yes, Lubriderm has made some exciting changes to enhance our products! We have improved our formulas including the addition of Pro-Ceramide, but don’t worry-our lotions are still fast-absorbing with a clean, non-greasy feel. What is Pro-Ceramide and why is it important? Pro-Ceramide has been shown to penetrate within skin’s surface layers and help support your skin’s natural Ceramide levels. Ceramides play a role in helping maintain a healthy moisture barrier which helps retain moisture within your skin’s surface. Is Lubriderm lotion safe for use on tattoos? Experts recommend using a water-based lotion to hydrate tattooed skin. Lubriderm Daily Moisture Lotion Fragrance Free is a gentle, water-based, unscented lotion that quickly absorbs and moisturizes for healthy-looking skin. Which Lubriderm lotion is best for winter skin? Dry, winter air coupled with heat indoors can lead to very dry skin. Intensely moisturizing products such as Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Moisturizing Cream Fragrance-Free replenish extra dry skin and help to restore your skin's moisture barrier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite lotion
reviews.reviewText: My hands are always dry and rough. My wife says my hands are like crocodile skin. The lubriderm lotion is the only one I've found that actually moisturizes my skin for a long time and softens skin over time. Feels very soothing when you're knuckles are very dry/cracking and this helps alleviate and heal. Works great for me and I like the non slippery feel and non scented.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best skincare I have ever used
reviews.reviewText: First, some things to understand:I am a pop skincare girlie. I have tried so many affordable skin care productsand I have been heavy into the skincare scene for YEARS. I love flashy packaging and pretty niche products.Second, I am a dry skin girlie. DRY-dry but I have always wanted soft, supple skin.Third, I hate the feeling of thick lotion on my body.I have used oil, cream, lotion, washes, treatments etc on my body for years in the pursuit of soft skin. My legs and areas that rub clothes aren’t like, cracking dry, but never seem to retain moisture. My forearms are also always dry.I got a small bottle of this from target to carry in my purse and I’d use it intermittently on my arms and hands throughout the day. It has a soft, clean scent that kind of reminds me of my grandma but not in a bad way at all. Just clean and subtle. It works so well. My skin feels refreshed after applying with no heavy feel.I am obsessed with this lotion and bought 3 giant bottles to keep in all my bathrooms at home. I put it on when I get out of the shower on damp skin. It absorbs quickly and doesn’t have a greasy feel that feels gross when putting on a robe.While it does make my skin feel hydrated immediately, over time (about a month), with continued use, I am finally soft all over, all of the time.For all of the gimmicks and flashy packaging and marketing out there, nothing has worked so well. I feel so smooth and soft and my skin hasn’t been uncomfortably tight once.If I miss a day, I am still soft. I feel like something I’m this has improved the health of my skin and makes it easier to maintain healthy moisture on its own.10/10 highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lubriderm is clean and light
reviews.reviewText: Amazing stuff. Very moisturizing, top quality and very economical. Well worth the $10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great unscented lotion
reviews.reviewText: My favorite lotion by far. It’s unscented which I prefer, and thick enough to provide good moisture but not feel bulky or sticky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great lotion but the pump bottle is difficult to get going.
reviews.reviewText: Maybe it's just me and the fact that i never use these pump type of bottles, but trying to get the first pump ended with me pulling off the pump part. Normally, you push and twist these things and they'll pop out then work... this one doesn't do that. There is no sticker or hints on how to get it working right. I tried for 15 minutes to do it without breaking something then just pulled it off in frustration. I did manage to put it back on by lining up the piece right and giving it one hard pump to click it back into place, now it works as intended. I just really wish it had a screw top or a cap with anything but that pump. The lotion itself is excellent. I work outdoors and my cheeks nose and forehead get windburned or sun burned all the time. I've used Lubriderm for years, it's the only lotion I'll use on my face. I even use it after every shave. It's not greasy and won't make you break out like other lotions. Excellent product... just find a a better cap that fits this bottle and you're golden.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Keeps dry skin moisturized for at least 12 hours. Bottle easy to operate. Just a little dollop goes a long way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I’ve been looking for. So soft on hands and body. Not greasy at all. Light scent smells really good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We have had a lotion debate for a couple of years that has finally come to a rest. What lotion works good, does not have a strong odor and is a good value. Found it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 26, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: Nothing worked the best than this one
reviews.reviewText: This has worked miracles on my littles ones dry skin. Nothing worked the best than this one. All expensive creams and prescription creams don't work as much as Lubriderm.

I bought this on the recommendation of a friend to keep my tattoo moisturised. It turned out to be so good that I'm now using at for all moisturising purposes. Its effectivity is incredible, and I can still feel the smoothness of my skin on the next morning. The plain vanilla smell and the non-sticky nature are also worth it.
It’s the best moisturiser!! In the world

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 10, 2016
